headline: Greenland Focus: Top Defense Stocks
summary: Defense stocks stand to gain from the Trump-NATO Greenland deal, and the best ones to buy have solid fundamentals. Click here for 3 top defense stocks.

headline: A Look At General Dynamics (GD) Valuation After Its New US$988m U.S. Navy C5ISR Contract
summary: General Dynamics (GD) is back in focus after its General Dynamics Information Technology unit secured a US$988 million contract to modernize the U.S. Navy’s C5ISR systems, a long term program that directly ties into defense technology spending. See our latest analysis for General Dynamics. The new C5ISR award comes after General Dynamics was recently highlighted among the “10 Best Defense Stocks in the S&P 500,” and even with a 1-day share price return of 0.7% decline and a 7-day share price...
